channel.title: Webassembly on Sergio Méndez Website
channel.description: Recent content in Webassembly on Sergio Méndez Website

item.title: Corre WebAssemply en edge usando WasmEdge, KCD Argentina, Argentina
item.description: I spoke about how to run WebAssembly on the edge using WasmEdge.

item.title: Preparando Submarinos en el Edge con Kubernetes, KCD Argentina, Online
item.description: I spoke about how to automate the process of create an argentinian hot drink called submarine, using edge computing and cloud native technologies like Kubernetes.
